question:
Every country should have a free health service, even if this means that the latest medical treatments may not be available through the service because they are too expensive.

To what extent do you agree or disagree
text: Health is Paramount to every country. It is argued that free Medical  Services should be free to the masses, whether or not the newest medical supplies are, Expensive to be made available. This essay will agree with this viewpoint.

Firstly, just the proper amount care can save a million from dying. For example, if the current trend of  free treatment is well managed,  with a proper patient follow up, giving a desirable outcome,  There won't be a need to purchase expensive supplies in the health facilities and several people can live.  Additionally, free medical services will help reduce cases Of illnesses aggravating. Most serious illnesses are mostly managed with  expensive drugs. Therefore, if patients can get free assess to free health services they can easily get themselves treated before the their condition becomes worse.  This is why medical services Should be free.

Another point to consider is that, diseases can be managed in several ways without spending outrageously. Health is not just about medicines and hospitalization. It also involves the physical and mental being of a person. Therefore, not all illness requires medication. Education on palliative treatments  such  as environmental sanitation and physical education can be promoted  to prevent the masses from coming down with serious  disease Condition. For  this reason medical services Should be available.

In summary, health should be the focus of all countries, irrespective of their medical supplies. Health facilities Should practice active management of funds and palliative treatments to reach out to all persons who needs medical services.
